content:
Certainly! Here are some recommended Italian restaurants in Leyton:

1. Yard Sale Pizza - Though Yard Sale Pizza is known for wood-fired pizzas with unique toppings, they also have a range of Italian-inspired dishes on the menu, including a mushroom tagliatelle and arancini.

2. Leytonstone Pizzas - This restaurant offers a menu of Italian pizzas using fresh, high-quality ingredients.

3. Paolo's Italian Restaurant - A family-run restaurant serving classic Italian dishes, such as spaghetti carbonara and margherita pizza.

4. La Gina - Known for their homemade pasta dishes and wood-fired oven pizzas, La Gina offers a true taste of Italian cuisine.

5. Sodo Pizza - Sodo Pizza offers both traditional pizzas and creative toppings like butternut squash and gorgonzola.

I hope these recommendations help you find the Italian food you are looking for!
